title: ‘Catastrophic Consequences’: Shock and Dismay in Peloton at Rumored Jumbo-Visma/Quick-Step Merger
content:
Is Jumbo-Visma going to merge with Soudal-Quick Step? Former and present pros are stunned at recent reports.

Read the full article at ‘Catastrophic Consequences’: Shock and Dismay in Peloton at Rumored Jumbo-Visma/Quick-Step Merger on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
